product_name: Seattle Sports X.U.D. Waterproof Rackbag Duffel - Special Buy
long_description: The versatile X.U.D. Waterproof Rackbag Duffel is great for rainy bike commutes. Its 9 lb. capacity easily holds your lunch and other daily necessities while you ride. Welded seams and durable vinyl body offer complete protection from rain and splashes. Rolltop closure with wide-mouth opening provides easy access to gear; foam lining provides extra protection for valuables. Lateral cinch straps and quick-release buckles easily secure the duffel to a rear bike rack (not included). Handles and shoulder strap offer easy portability. Special buy.
short_description: The versatile X.U.D. Waterproof Rackbag Duffel is great for rainy bike commutes. Its 9 lb. capacity easily holds your lunch and other daily necessities while you ride.
